OdiaGenAIOCR/Odia-lipi-ocr-data.description: Odia handwritten and printed text dataset for OCR

indicnlp/indic_languages.description: Includes Odia as part of Indic languages dataset

recommendation: Start with OdiaGenAIOCR/Odia-lipi-ocr-data + v2 if available

strategies.name: Simple Concat (Recommended for Phase 1)
strategies.code:
# Load multiple datasets
datasets = []
dataset1 = load_dataset("OdiaGenAIOCR/Odia-lipi-ocr-data")
datasets.append(dataset1["train"])

# Combine
combined = concatenate_datasets(datasets)

strategies.name: Balanced Mix (Phase 2)
strategies.code:
# Sample equally from each source
from datasets import concatenate_datasets
dataset1 = load_dataset("OdiaGenAIOCR/Odia-lipi-ocr-data")["train"]
# Add more datasets...
combined = concatenate_datasets([d.select(range(min(100, len(d)))) for d in datasets])
